item.title: daapd (aka Owntone) Deprecation Notice
item.description:
Due to issues maintaining the necessary level of support and development, we are deprecating our daapd container.

We recommend switching to their official container.
item.content:
Due to issues maintaining the necessary level of support and development, we are deprecating our daapd container.

We recommend switching to their official container.

item.title: New Container: Daapd
item.description:
We have released a new container for Daapd!

Daapd (iTunes) media server with support for AirPlay devices, Apple Remote (and compatibles), Chromecast, MPD and internet radio.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Daapd!

Daapd (iTunes) media server with support for AirPlay devices, Apple Remote (and compatibles), Chromecast, MPD and internet radio.
